project.description:
Build AOSP after pulling changes from local_manifest.
Note: The following flags have to agree: local_manifest, dev_projects, and dev_refspec. See notes in each flag for reference.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: init_tag
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The tag of the android manifest used in repo init, i.e. repo init -u https://android.googlesource.com/platform/manifest -b init_tag

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: dev_refspec
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the development branch that will be checked out for *only* the dev_projects, i.e. repo forall $dev_projects -c 'git checkout $(git rev-parse $dev_refspec)'

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: local_manifest
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description:
The full contents local_manifest.xml. Normally you'll want to add the projects mentioned in this manifest to the $dev_projects flag.
Right after an initial repo sync with android.googlesource.com, the local_manifest is copied to .repo/local_manifest.xml, and we do another repo sync.
After that, we check out the specified development branch for each dev project. See documentation for dev_refspec and dev_projects
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue: <manifest> <remote name="github" fetch="https://github.com" /> <remove-project name="platform/build" /> <project path="build" remote="github" name="nesl/platform_build" revision="refs/tags/android-4.2.2_r1"> <copyfile src="core/root.mk" dest="Makefile" /> </project> <remove-project name="platform/frameworks/native" /> <project path="frameworks/native" remote="github" name="nesl/platform_frameworks_native" revision="refs/tags/android-4.2.2_r1" /> <remove-project name="platform/frameworks/base" /> <project path="frameworks/base" remote="github" name="nesl/platform_frameworks_base" revision="refs/tags/android-4.2.2_r1" /> </manifest>

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: dev_projects
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: *Space separated* list of projects for which we will sync changes from the $dev_refspec, i.e. repo forall $dev_projects -c 'git checkout $(git rev-parse $dev_refspec)'

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: lunch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The lunch command passed onto the AOSP build system.
